Blog.post: kaes. todae's canossian's dae mass. =] skl ends kinda early. at. 9.30am. =) early rites. so..my friends yu ting and vanjill came over to my place for swimming ans sun-tanning...hahax...we really had fun kaes...to save time, we took a taxi down to siglap(my place)...on da way...talked about a person in our class hu luvs to gossip bout ppl...luvs calling ppl a "bitch" and also an "ah lian"...but dont even noe bout she herself lorz!!!~haish~she always sae dat she can't stand ppl's character...but she doesn't even noe dat ppl can't stand her "act act" character... keas...yupz...so when we arrived @ my house...rested for a while den went to da gym to build up our stamina for our oncoming 2.4km run...den when to da carpark to fetch my younger sis frm her sch bus... keas!after dat...we went for our swimming n of course sun-tanning...while vanjill was sun-tanning, i tot yu ting how to sommersort...shes so crazy abt learning how to sommersort ok...but...can tell ya dat tis ger is a real fast learning...learn how to sommersort in juz a few minutes...no joke...no joke. after having our bath...went bk to my place to have lunch.den vanjill had to go hm coz she will be having a faminly reunion dinner tonight...so, we brought her to hail for a taxi den yu ting n myself went to "Shell" to buy some chips for tea-break... We den went to bk da tennis court to play.but b4 dat, we went up to my house to get da rackets and balls...waah...i can tell u,yu ting is real gd @ tennis kaes...:)went to da guard house to get da keys to da court...played untill bout lyk 4.30pm or so... den our face like so damn red lors! om-goodness.so happie. when i told yu ting dat she bacame tanner, she really really freak out ok...her wish have finally came through to become tanner. ~haish~she still suck a lot ok...always there gosipping bout ppl...lyk nth better to do lyk dat one...lyk wat my other friends think.when i showed them the pics on friendster.they even said dat she act pretty onli...but not even pretty at all okeas...still can make those funny posses to make herself look even more uglier lorz!!! even yu ting friend oso said da same think as wad yu ting,vanjill and myself said ok... always when one of us goes online hoh,she will definitely go offling one...dont noe why she trying to aviod us only...wad is da prb with her arx???uh huh...maybe she juz feels guilty bout wad she did by critisizing my best friend,yu ting...say that she is an "ah lian" when she is not @ all ok...so very very angry wif her okaes...say yu ting fold da skirt...lyk she neva fold lyk dat lorz!!!she even fold it shorter den yu ting ok... ~haish~better not tok abt her anymore.toking bout her makes mi feel even more angry ok...kkx...wanna go wash my face already...sp pain...lyk wad yu ting said...her face also very pain!!!:):):)buiaz!!!(",)
